title: Meditation: Awareness, Aliveness and Space (2018-11-28)
itunes:title: Meditation: Awareness, Aliveness and Space
description:
Meditation: Awareness, Aliveness and Space (2018-11-28) - This guided meditation awakens our awareness within our body, extends to include sound, and invites a resting as awareness that includes all passing waves of experience.

Free download of Tara's 10 min meditation:
"Mindful Breathing: Finding Calm and Ease"
when you join her email list.
